I need a deployment YAML for an nginx server.

Here's a simple deployment YAML for nginx:
```yaml
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx-deployment
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: nginx
        image: nginx:1.17.1
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
```

How do I configure a liveness probe for a container?

Here's a YAML snippet to configure a liveness probe for a container in your deployment:
```yaml
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: liveness-deployment
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: liveness-app
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: liveness-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: liveness-container
        image: my-image

            path: /health
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 10
```

```yaml
apiVersion: apps/v1
```

```yaml
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: unique-app
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: unique-app
    spec:
      containers:
```

I need to automatically upgrade images in a Deployment when a new image is available.

```yaml
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:

spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: myapp
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: myapp
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: myapp-container
        image: myapp:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
```
